data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve polling places by ward, accessibility, or type
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of polling places in Philadelphia, optionally filtered and organized by ward/division, accessibility rating, or building type. This data is used for poll worker assignment, equipment distribution, and accessibility material allocation. Accepts optional query parameters to filter and organize results. Returns a collection of polling place features with location, accessibility, and facility information.
